comments: Search is based on date/time, from place/to place, one way or round trip.

response code: 201 Created / 400 Bad Request / 409 SeatsUnavailable / 402 Payment Required
comments: Booking requires authenticated user. Generates unique PNR. Persists passenger details and payment txn id. Emails confirmation & downloadable e-ticket.

request headers: Content-Type: application/json; Authorization: Bearer <USER_TOKEN or None>
comments: Allows lookup by PNR even without login while some details are masked unless authenticated.

response code: 200 OK / 400 Bad Request / 403 Forbidden / 404 Not Found
comments: Allow cancellation only if current_time <= travelDate - 24 hours. Apply cancellation rules & fees.
